name: NJARTYGALEN
description:
NJARTYGALEN is a 3D spaceship simulator inspired by Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes.

It is a submission for the Multiplayer Game Jam (August, 2022).

You and your best friend have been abducted by an alien spaceship…

But the ship is about to crash!

One of you must operate the cockpit and the other will try to guide following the Spaceship Repairing Manual (Instructions.pdf).

*We encourage that one of you only watches at the game, and the other at the manual, for a better gaming experience*

If you correctly manipulate the cockpit modules, the ship will land safely.

Controls:

Only mouse. Click, click and drag, etc.

Music by: Kevin McLeod, Ennio Maccaroni, Brand X Music.
